name: 黃秀英
objective:
Pre-requisite：3001011 or approved by the course instructor. 
Course Contents: Force, mass and acceleration, particle kinematics, particle dynamics, work and energy, impulse and momentum, rigid body motion, and dynamics of the rigid body system.
schedule:
Week    Topics
1)     Syllabus & Introduction to Dynamics
2)     Kinematics of Particles: Rectilinear & Curvilinear Motions
3)     Kinetics of Particles: Newton’s Second Law
4)     Kinetics of Particles: Newton’s Second Law
5)     Kinetics of Particles: Energy and Momentum Methods
6)     Kinetics of Particles: Energy and Momentum Methods
7)     Kinetics of Particles: Energy and Momentum Methods &
Systems of Particles
8)     Systems of Particles
9)     Midterm Exam
10)    Kinematics of Rigid Bodies
11)    Kinematics of Rigid Bodies
12)    Kinematics of Rigid Bodies & Plane Motion of Rigid Bodies
13)    Plane Motion of Rigid Bodies: Forces and Accelerations
14)    Plane Motion of Rigid Bodies: Energy and Momentum Methods
15)    Plane Motion of Rigid Bodies: Energy and Momentum Methods
16)    Kinetics of Rigid Bodies in Three Dimensions
17)    Mechanical Vibrations
18)    Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1.	Quiz (平常考)：15 % (in general will be hold on almost every Monday)
2.	Midterm Exam (期中考)：25 % 
3.	Final Exam (期末考)：30 %
4.	Homework/Vocabulary/Pre-class study (作業)：15%
5.	In-class discussion, group discussion, participation, attendance & class notes (上課答問、出席率、上課筆記): 15 %
6.	Homework is due the following Monday. You would need to upload your homework to i-School before the class starts. No late homework will not be accepted except having approved absence (作業上課前交，上傳 i - 學園，無遲交作業除非有正式假單)。
7.	Copy and cheating are not allowed. 0 point will be given for all involved parties if copy or cheating is found (嚴禁抄襲，抄襲者 0 分) 。
8.	Please turn off your cell phone, or set your phone in silence mode; otherwise, 5 points will be deducted from the semester score and treated as one absence for each violation (上課中，手機請關機或以振動方式收訊。違者警告並記矌課一次且學期成績扣 5 分)。
9.	Attendance check will be done every week. Please sit in a fixed seat (依規定，每次上課點名，請固定座位上課。)
10.	Class notes will be checked as part of attendance check (上課筆記為出席率一部分)
